title: Fiery Jerk-Spiced Pork & Potato Mash
keywords: Jerk, Spicy, Pork, Caribbean, Mashed potatoes

method.step: Before you start cooking, take your pork steak out of the bridge open the packet and let it ajust to room temperture, then boil a kettle
Peel and chop yout sweet potato(es) into bite size pieces
Add the chopped sweet potato to a pot of boiled water over a heigh hear and bring to the boil
Cook for 10-12 minutes  or until fork tender
Add your pork loin steak(s) to a bowl with hald your jerk paste, half your white wine vinegar and half your flour
Add a pinch of salt and pepper and give everything a good mix up. This is your jerk spiced pork
Heat a large, wide based pan over a heigh hear wuth a small drizzle of vegetable oil
Once hot, add the jerk spiced pork and cook for 5-6 minutes  on each side or until slightly charred and cooked through
While the pork is cooking reboil half a kettle combine your carrot & cabbage slaw mix with your mayo and the remaining white wine vinegar
Add a pinch of salt and pepper and give everything a good mix up. This is your slaw
Dissolve your Checken stock mix in your boiled water with the remaining jerk paste a ounch of suger and a generous pinch of salt and papper. this is your jerk spiced stock
Once the potatoes are tender, drain, return them to the pot
Add a slamm knob of butter and a pinch of salt to the potatoes and mash them untill smooth. this is your sweet potatoe mash
Cover with a lit to keep warm untill serving
Once the pork is done, transfer the coocked steak to a clean chopping board (Reserve the pan) and leave to rest for 2 minutes
Return the reserved pan to medium heat with the remaining flour and stir for 30 secs
Gradually stir the jerk spiced stock and cook for 2 minutes  until a smooth, thick sauce remains.  This is your jerk spiced sauce
(Scrape any bits from the bottom of the pan as it will add flavour to the sauce)
Slice the rested pork
Serve the sliced pork with the sweet potato mash and slaw to the side
Drizzle the jerk spiced sauce over the sliced pork
Enjoy
